hints.content:
Jack has $\goldE{89}$ magic beans.

![The number line is labeled on the right with 89 and extends to the left.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c42d62a1d7bcdaf7392775b7eac47e69d3287d21)

To subtract on the number line, we jump to the **left**.

He gave $\maroonD{32}$ magic beans to his sister.

![Starting on the right with 89 move left minus 32 and goes to 57.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b2753cc23138e3338e31591114562565e9e6a00)

$\goldE{89} - \maroonD{32} = 57$

He gave $\purpleD{24}$ magic beans to his best friend.

![Starting on the right with 89 move left minus 32 and goes to 57. From 57 minus 24 goes to 33. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/edae8627d36683414e43a244e56114b1a9516219)

$57 - \purpleD{24} =33$

$\blueE{18}$ magic beans got planted.

![A number line starts at 15 on the left and 89 on the right. Starting on the right with 89 move left minus 32 and goes to 57. From 57 minus 24 goes to 33. From 33 minus 18 goes to 15.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2854d739ccf72a57da0593ca5641bb671dc8d18e)

$33 - \blueE{18} = 15$

Here is the correct number line:

![A number line starts at ? on the left and 89 on the right. Starting on the right with 89 move left minus 32 and goes to 57. From 57 minus 24 goes to 33. From 33 minus 18 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d3103354808e4853ab23d692cd4b96c7d7ccfd17)

Jack has ${15}$ magic beans left.

question.content:
Jack had $89$ magic beans.  

He gave $32$ magic beans to his sister, $24$ to his best friend, and he planted $18$ magic beans.  

**Which number line shows how to find how many magic beans Jack has left?**  

[[☃ radio 2]]  

**How many magic beans does Jack have left?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] magic beans

choices.content: ![A number line starts at ? on the left and 89 on the right. Starting on the right with 89 move left minus 32 to 57. From 57 minus 24 goes to 33. From 33 minus 18 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d3103354808e4853ab23d692cd4b96c7d7ccfd17)

![A number line starts at 9 with plus 32 and goes to 41. From 41 plus 24 goes to 65. From 65 plus 18 goes to  ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/03668a9894784fd37455b4cf46d93cd8c29c2fb8)
